amendment.description: An amendment to add a new section to the end of the resolution , that during consideration of H. R. 2670, it shall not be in order to consider amendment number 60 printed in Part B of House Report 118-141.
amendment.purpose: Amendment extends parole-in-place authority to non-citizen military veterans with an honorable discharge.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 207 (Roll no. 293).
